string.name: ruleDetails
string.div: In the Boardroom, the Leaders of the company are deciding the Product Managers of the next 5 Products from amongst themselves. Unknown to them, some of them have made deals with a competitor to fail the company. If the Traitors manage to fail 3 products, the company goes bankrupt and the Leaders lose. The Leaders have to identify the Traitors in time to successfully launch new products and save their company.
The Leaders do not know the identity of the traitors. However, all traitors know each other\'s role.

Once a Product Management Team is decided by the Leaders, the selected Leaders vote for the Success or Failure of the Product. In groups less than 7, only 1 Traitor's vote in the Product Team is enough to Fail the Product.
The Leaders/Traitors who reach 3 victories win the Game.
All voting is done through Secret Ballot. Nobody can divulge their votes or show their roles to others
The voting is timed. Each Leader/Traitor needs to make a vote within 5 seconds.
